muxcontrol.Change the control scheme of your curren: Change the control scheme of your current selected content

muxcustom.Change how the font type works in the fr: Endre måten skrifttyper oppfører seg i frontend - 'Tema' forsikrer at frontend vil bruke skrifttyper som hører til temaet - 'Språk' holder seg til språk-baserte skrifttyper
muxcustom.Change the appearance of the muOS fronte: Endre utseende på muOS frontend launcher
muxcustom.Download themes from the muOS website: Download themes from the muOS website
muxcustom.Hide system box art images in Content Ex: Hide system box art images in Content Explorer when theme uses grid mode
muxcustom.Load user created artwork catalogue for: Last inn brukergenerert kunstverkskatalog for innhold
muxcustom.Switch between pressing A or holding A t: Switch between pressing A or holding A to launch content save state automatically
muxcustom.Toggle the background animation of the c: Skru av/på bakgrunns-animasjonen til det nåværende temaet
muxcustom.Toggle the fade to black animation on co: Skru av/på mørk overgangsanimasjon under lansering av innhold
muxcustom.Toggle the splash image on content launc: Skru av/på splash-bildet under lansering av innhold
muxcustom.Toggles the ability to shuffle content u: Toggles the ability to shuffle content using the R2 button

muxdanger.Amount of data preloaded in memory befor:
Mengde data forhåndslastet i minnet før det blir forespurt

Større verdier forbedrer ytelsen ved sekvensiell lesing
muxdanger.Automatically adjusts scheduler behaviou:
Justerer automatisk planleggerens oppførsel basert på CPU-antall

Deaktiver for konsekvent finjustering på enheter
muxdanger.Background write back starts when dirty:
Bakgrunns write back begynner når skitten data overskrider denne prosenten RAM

Lavere verdier hjelper med å minske latency
muxdanger.Controls how aggressively the system swa:
Kontrollerer hvor aggressivt systemet bytter minne til disk

Lavere verdier holder prosesser i RAM lenger
muxdanger.Controls how kernel merges I/O requests\:
Kontrollerer hvordan kjernen slår sammen I/O-forespørsler

Deaktivering av sammenslåinger kan forbedre ytelsen til spesifikk flash-lagring
muxdanger.Enables or disables tracking of per-devi:
Aktiverer eller deaktiverer sporing av I/O-statistikk per enhet

Deaktivering kan forbedre ytelsen noe
muxdanger.Flushes dirty data on idle instead of us:
Fjerner skitten data ved inaktivitet i stedet for å bruke write back terskler

Nytting for flashlagring eller for å redusere strømforbruk ved inaktivitet
muxdanger.Higher values reclaim cached file data m:
Høyere verdier gjenoppretter hurtigbufrede fildata mer aggressivt

Lavere verdier forbedrer ytelsen for gjentatt filtilgang
muxdanger.How long real-time tasks run before swit:
Hvor lenge sanntidsoppgaver kjører før de bytter

Lavere verdier favoriserer respons, høyere verdier favoriserer gjennomstrømning
muxdanger.Number of pages read ahead when swapping:
Antall sider som leses på forhånd ved bytting

Lavere verdier = mindre latency, høyere = mer effektiv masselesing
muxdanger.Percentage of RAM allowed to hold unwrit: Prosentandel RAM som er tillatt å holde uskrevne (skitne) data før det tvinges skriving til disk
muxdanger.Sets the maximum number of queued I/O re:
Angir maksimalt antall I/O-forespørsler i kø per enhet

Høyere verdier øker gjennomstrømningen, men bruker mer RAM
muxdanger.Switch between different storage tuning:
Switch between different storage tuning options

May improve performance on certain mSD cards
muxdanger.Switch between system sleep suspend stat:
Switch between system sleep suspend states

Changes how the device reacts to sleep mode and wake locks
muxdanger.When enabled, a newly forked child proce:
Når den er aktivert, kjører en nylig forgrenet child-prosess før parent.

Kan forbedre lastetidene for enkelte apper

muxdevice.Toggles RGB LED integration on device: Toggles RGB LED integration on device
muxdevice.Toggles hall switch (lid) support on dev:
Toggles hall switch (lid) support on device

Do not enable this on non-lid devices!
muxdevice.Toggles internal Portmaster support on d: Toggles internal Portmaster support on device
muxdevice.Toggles kernel level DebugFS mount on st:
Toggles kernel level DebugFS mount on startup

Best to leave this enabled unless otherwise advised!

muxgov.Configure CPU governors to dynamically a: Konfigurer CPU-regulatorer for å dynamisk justere CPU-frekvensen og bidra til å balansere strømforbruk og ytelse

muxhdmi.Switch between overscan or underscan to: Veksle mellom overscan og underscan for å passe skjermen

muxinfo.View the current used space of the mount: Vis den nåværende brukte plassen til de monterte lagringsenhetene

muxthemefilter.Filter to theme with a name containing l: Filter to theme with a name containing lookup text.
muxthemefilter.Filter to themes for this device or all: Filter to themes for this device or all themes.  All themes can work on any device but if the theme does not implement your devices resolution it will be letterboxed.
muxthemefilter.Filter to themes that let muOS handle tr: Filter to themes that let muOS handle translating text.  Themes that use static images for the main menu will be filtere out.
muxthemefilter.Filter to themes that support HDMI resol: Filter to themes that support HDMI resolution 1280x720.  Themes will still work on HDMI without support for 1280x720 but content will be letterboxed.
muxthemefilter.Filter to themes that support displaying: Filter to themes that support displaying content folders in a tile layout

muxtweakadv.Adjust the rate of speed when holding na: Adjust the rate of speed when holding navigation keys down
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system swapfile if required b: Adjust the system swapfile if required by certain content
muxtweakadv.Adjust the system zram if required by ce: Adjust the system zram if required by certain content
muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: Change how the device buttons work globally

muxtweakadv.Change the default brightness level that: Change the default brightness level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: Change the default theme used for the next device launch
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: Change the displayed battery percentage to improve accuracy based on calibration or known deviations in the battery capacity reading
muxtweakadv.Change the partition number requested up: Change the partition number requested upon external storage mount
Change the partition number requested upon secondary storage mount

muxtweakadv.Toggle the audio overdrive moving it fro: Toggle the audio overdrive moving it from 100% to 200%

muxtweakadv.Toggle the forced settings muOS places o: Toggle the forced settings muOS places on RetroArch configurations
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the power bu: Toggle the functionality of the power button to switch DPAD mode
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the user ini: Toggle the functionality of the user initialisation scripts on device startup
muxtweakadv.Toggle the lid switch functionality for: Toggle the lid switch functionality for the device

muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: Toggle the system ability to automatically shut the device down due high temperature
muxtweakadv.Toggle vibration for device startup, sle: Toggle vibration for device startup, sleep, and shutdown

muxtweakgen.Change the brightness of the device to a: Change the brightness of the device to a specific level
muxtweakgen.Change the colour temperature of the dis: Change the colour temperature of the display if the device supports it

muxvisual.Changes the top title label in Explore C: Changes the top title label in Explore Content to show current storage device along with folder name
muxvisual.Changes the transparency of the overlay: Changes the transparency of the overlay image for the frontend only
muxvisual.Rearranges the label of content to move: Rearranges the label of content to move the 'The' label to the front - For example, 'Batman and Robin, The' to 'The Batman and Robin'
muxvisual.Remove extra information from content la: Remove extra information from content labels - This does NOT rename your files it only changes how it is displayed
muxvisual.Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) f: Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) for content labels
muxvisual.Replaces the label of shortened content: Replaces the label of shortened content folders to more appropriately named labels
muxvisual.Switch between different overlay styles: Switch between different overlay styles for the frontend only
muxvisual.Toggle hidden content displayed in Explo: Toggle hidden content displayed in Explore Content - Place a '.' or '_' character at the start of a file or folder name to hide it
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of currently selec: Toggle the visibility of currently selected file along with total in Explore Content
Toggle the visibility of currently selected folder along with total in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of empty folders i: Toggle the visibility of empty folders in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the battery gly: Toggle the visibility of the battery glyph
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the clock: Toggle the visibility of the clock
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the item count: Toggle the visibility of the item count within folders in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the network gly: Toggle the visibility of the network glyph

muxwebserv.Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22: Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22
